Class EventMonitor

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.cam.cl.groupproject12.lima.monitor.EventMonitor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class EventMonitor
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Manages the replication of data between HBase and PostgreSQL on completion of a Hadoop MapReduce job.

      • doSynchronise

        public static void doSynchronise(IP routerIP,
                 HBaseConnectionDetails hbaseConf,
                 long timeProcessed)
        Invokes and runs synchronisers on a hardcoded list of tables.
        Parameters:
        routerIP - Router to synchronise.
        hbaseConf - Configuration data to be able to connect to HBase
        timeProcessed - Timestamp carried from the start of the processing phase.
